data.name: Vanilla Brain Exam
data.detailed_description:
Vanilla Brain Exam is the purest iced vanilla bean brain exam eroge you’ll ever play! This cute and bubbly game is everything you ever wanted in a vanilla sex game. There are no frills or complicated mechanics, just simple and pure vanilla sex scenes. Girls are cute and welcoming with the only objective of making you feel good about yourself. You’ll be able to examine them in all the right places and enjoy every inch of their bodies. There are 6 different girls to choose from and each one is cuter than the last. The game is easy to get into and there’s no need to read a ton of text to get started. Just settle in and enjoy the game!

Each girl has 5 different sex scenes that you can unlock. The game is short and sweet but it’s the perfect way to unwind after a long day. The bright and bubbly art is a delight and the girls are just as adorable as they are sexy.

Features:

- 6 Cute and sexy girls
- 5 Different sex scenes for each girl
- Simple and easy to play
- Bubbly and bright art style

Gameplay:

- Visual novel elements before and after each game.
- Polished Match 3 gameplay with a custom implementation with attention to detail.
- High quality CG render unlocked after every game. Failure to progress is also progress.
- Choices during dialogue affect gameplay.
- Explicit sex scenes where you get to explore what every girl has to offer.

Match 3 or more gems of the same type to increase the girl's affection. Once the affection meter fills up, you'll proceed to the reward. Be careful not to match bombs as they'll reduce your score and could cause you to lose the match. But don't worry, losing a game can also reward you with extra scenes in certain situations.

Every location offers a different set of skills you can use to your advantage. Use them wisely as they could make all the difference in a match, and only have a limited number of uses.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

Minimum:

mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

content_descriptors.notes: Contains images of sexually explicit content and nudity.
